verses.text: And \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* in his stead, and \w strengthened|strong="H2388"\w* himself against \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And he \w placed|strong="H5414"\w* \w forces|strong="H2428"\w* in all the \w fenced|strong="H1219"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w garrisons|strong="H5333"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and in the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, which \w Asa|strong="H0609"\w* his \w father|strong="H0001"\w* had \w taken|strong="H3920"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* was with \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w*, because he \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* in the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* of his \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, and \w sought|strong="H1875"\w* not unto \w Baalim|strong="H1168"\w*;\f + \fr 17.3 \ft of…: or, of his father, and of David\f*

But \w sought|strong="H1875"\w* to the \add  \+nd Lord\+nd*\add* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, and \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* in his \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*, and not after the \w doings|strong="H4639"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

Therefore the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w stablished|strong="H3559"\w* the \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w* in his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*; and all \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w brought|strong="H5414"\w* to \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* \w presents|strong="H4503"\w*; and he had \w riches|strong="H6239"\w* and \w honour|strong="H3519"\w* in \w abundance|strong="H7230"\w*.\f + \fr 17.5 \ft brought: Heb. gave\f*

And his \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* was lifted \w up|strong="H1361"\w* in the \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: moreover he took \w away|strong="H5493"\w* the high \w places|strong="H1116"\w* and \w groves|strong="H0842"\w* out of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.\f + \fr 17.6 \ft was…: that is, was encouraged\f*

¶ Also in the \w third|strong="H7969"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of his \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* he \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* to his \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*, \add even\add* to \w Ben-hail|strong="H1134"\w*, and to \w Obadiah|strong="H5662"\w*, and to \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w*, and to \w Nethaneel|strong="H5417"\w*, and to \w Michaiah|strong="H4322"\w*, to \w teach|strong="H3925"\w* in the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

And with them \add he sent\add* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, \add even\add* \w Shemaiah|strong="H8098"\w*, and \w Nethaniah|strong="H5418"\w*, and \w Zebadiah|strong="H2069"\w*, and \w Asahel|strong="H6214"\w*, and \w Shemiramoth|strong="H8070"\w*, and \w Jehonathan|strong="H3083"\w*, and \w Adonijah|strong="H0138"\w*, and \w Tobijah|strong="H2900"\w*, and \w Tob-adonijah|strong="H2899"\w*, \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*; and with them \w Elishama|strong="H0476"\w* and \w Jehoram|strong="H3088"\w*, \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*.

And they \w taught|strong="H3925"\w* in \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and \add had\add* the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* with them, and went \w about|strong="H5437"\w* throughout all the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and \w taught|strong="H3925"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

¶ And the \w fear|strong="H6343"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* fell upon all the \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w* of the \w lands|strong="H0776"\w* that \add were\add* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, so that they made no \w war|strong="H3898"\w* against \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w*.\f + \fr 17.10 \ft fell: Heb. was\f*

Also \add some\add* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* \w presents|strong="H4503"\w*, and \w tribute|strong="H4853"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*; and the \w Arabians|strong="H6163"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* him \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w*, \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w rams|strong="H0352"\w*, and \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* he \w goats|strong="H8495"\w*.

¶ And \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* \w waxed|strong="H1980"\w* \w great|strong="H1432"\w* \w exceedingly|strong="H4605"\w*; and he \w built|strong="H1129"\w* in \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w castles|strong="H1003"\w*, and \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w store|strong="H4543"\w*.\f + \fr 17.12 \ft castles: or, palaces\f*

And he had \w much|strong="H7227"\w* \w business|strong="H4399"\w* in the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*: and the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w war|strong="H4421"\w*, mighty \w men|strong="H1368"\w* of \w valour|strong="H2428"\w*, \add were\add* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

And these \add are\add* the \w numbers|strong="H6486"\w* of them according to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*: Of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, the \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* of \w thousands|strong="H0505"\w*; \w Adnah|strong="H5734"\w* the \w chief|strong="H8269"\w*, and with him mighty \w men|strong="H1368"\w* of \w valour|strong="H2428"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*.

And \w next|strong="H3027"\w* to him \add was\add* \w Jehohanan|strong="H3076"\w* the \w captain|strong="H8269"\w*, and with him two \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w fourscore|strong="H8084"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*.\f + \fr 17.15 \ft next…: Heb. at his hand\f*

And \w next|strong="H3027"\w* him \add was\add* \w Amasiah|strong="H6007"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zichri|strong="H2147"\w*, who willingly \w offered|strong="H5068"\w* himself unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; and with him two \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* mighty \w men|strong="H1368"\w* of \w valour|strong="H2428"\w*.

And of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*; \w Eliada|strong="H0450"\w* a mighty \w man|strong="H1368"\w* of \w valour|strong="H2428"\w*, and with him armed \w men|strong="H5401"\w* with \w bow|strong="H7198"\w* and \w shield|strong="H4043"\w* two \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*.

And \w next|strong="H3027"\w* him \add was\add* \w Jehozabad|strong="H3075"\w*, and with him an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w fourscore|strong="H8084"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* ready \w prepared|strong="H2502"\w* for the \w war|strong="H6635"\w*.

These \w waited|strong="H8334"\w* on the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, beside \add those\add* whom the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* in the \w fenced|strong="H4013"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* throughout all \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.
